Principal Investigator

Dr. Peichen Zhong
zhongpc[AT]berkeley.edu
Peichen received a B.S. in Physics from USTC (2018) and a Ph.D. in Materials Science from UC Berkeley (2023). After finishing postdoc research at LBNL & BIDMaP, he will be joining NUS MSE as a Presidential Young Professor (tenure-track assistant professor) in 2025 Fall. He is interested in computational modeling and AI for materials & chemistry/physics. He enjoys hiking, traveling, spicy cuisines, and writing with LaTeX.
